title: S2 ZWave pairing security process
extract: TL;DR: Stronger S2 Z-Wave pairing security process can be downgraded to weak S0, exposing smart devices to compromise. Z-Wave uses a shared network key to secure traffic. This key is exchanged between the controller and the client devices ('nodes') when the devices are paired.May 23, 2018
extract_html: TL;DR: Stronger S2 Z-Wave pairing security process can be downgraded to weak S0, exposing smart devices to compromise. Z-Wave uses a shared network key to secure traffic. This key is exchanged between the controller and the client devices ('nodes') when the devices are paired.May 23, 2018
